Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fiasco \Fi*as"co\, n.; pl. {Fiascoes}. [It.] A complete or ridiculous failure, esp. of a musical performance, or of any pretentious undertaking. [1913 Webster]
fiasco n : a sudden and violent collapse [syn: {debacle}] [also: {fiascoes} (pl)]
